title: Sociology is a Martial Art: Political Writings by Pierre Bourdieu
description: Sociology is a Martial Art is an accessible survey of Pierre Bourdieu's most influential writings. It includes the full text of his short books Acts of Resistance , Firing Back , and On Television , in addition to key articles, interviews, and speeches, all of which introduce the reader to Bourdieu's innovative approach to sociology as a mode of political intervention. author: Pierre Bourdieu
